game.name: Saints Row: The Third - Gangstas in Space
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A new movie is being shot in Steelport and you're the star! Join with your co-star, Jenny, to fight the alien invasion for the film Gangstas In Space. With spaceships and alien weaponry, this retro-style film is sure to be a hit!Gangstas in Space DLC is included in the Saints Row: The Third Season P
